item.description:
Would you like to learn more about the spiritual meaning of your dreams? Discuss alternative spirituality?

Have you had:

* An out-of-body experience?
* A dream with a departed loved one?
* A sense that you have lived before?
* An inner experience with light or sound?

You can connect with other like-minded Souls and learn new ways of exploring your inner worlds. Meet others who share profound and transformational personal experiences and discuss ways to incorporate spirituality into everyday life.

We offer informal spiritual discussions, workshops and other events that will help you to explore your inner worlds and to thrive spiritually. Our topics will include

*Past Lives, Dreams, and Soul Travel
*Meditation and Contemplation
*Astral Projection and Soul Travel
*Finding Your Purpose in Life
*Letting Go of Fear
*Creating Your Reality
*Accessing Your Own Inner Wisdom
*Spiritual Growth and Transformation
*Angels, Masters, and Inner Guides
*How Past Lives Affect Us Today
*Spiritual Wisdom on Relationships
*Spiritual Wisdom on Health and Healing
and many more, depending on the interests of the group.

There is never a cost for coming to and participating in our group meetings, just come and enjoy!

Sponsored by members of Eckankar as a community service.
Eckankar is an ancient spiritual teaching and a modern-day religion that is a resource for all people, whatever their religious background, to make spiritual experiences an everyday reality in their life.
Eckankar Connecticut website: http://www.ct-eckankar.org or Eckankar worldwide: http://www.eckankar.org
